verses.roman:
svaṁ svaṁ parigrahaṁ sarve
ādāya pitarau ca naḥ
arjunenāvitāḥ sarva
indraprasthaṁ gamiṣyatha

synonyms: svam svam—each his own; parigraham—family; sarve—all of them; ādāya—taking; pitarau—parents; ca—and; naḥ—Our; arjunena—by Arjuna; avitāḥ—protected; sarve—all; indraprastham—to Indraprastha; gamiṣyatha—you should go.
translation: You should all take your own families, together with My parents, and under Arjuna's protection go to Indraprastha.
